wikitext.*:
'''The Land of Shadow''' also known as '''Mordor ~ The Land of Shadow''' is a [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed website devoted to fans of [[Orcs]] and [[Mordor]]. It included a news section, articles about [[Black Speech]], an [[Orcs|Orc]] Name Generator, a history of [[Orcs]], wallpapers and external links to other Tolkien websites. It also included an interactive map of [[Mordor]], displaying information about several (non-canon) regions within it. The website was shut down in March 2019, but three years later, in October 2022 the website restarted for a brief period of time.
